price: 1. De afrekening is voor de mensheid dichtbij gekomen terwijl zij zich achteloos afkeerde.
arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: iq'taraba lilnnāsi ḥisābuhum wahum fī ghaflatin muʿ'riḍūna
